name: SUPER RECOILFIGHT
description:
SUPER RECOILFIGHT is a one-button projectile brawler-shooter optimized for 4 player gameplay on a single keyboard. You move and aim using the recoil of your shots, so time them right to win against your friends, AI or both.

Features:
  • Up to 4 players on a single keyboard
  • Easy to learn, hard to master
  • VS AI gameplay
  • Interesting modifiers to shake your game up
  • 19 Challenging, interactive and fun maps

Feel free to visit our discord for information, help and feedback purposes at https://discord.gg/fZUu4Hm
